features: 【Modern Farmhouse Style】Simple design that matches your aesthetic, the organizer rack with handles will be an elegant accent in your home and can be matched well with most household style.
【High-quality Materials】It's made with high-quality materials and has guardrail plates to ensure that items are kept in place and don't get damaged.
【Eco-friendly Design】The organizer is made with eco-friendly paint and natural bamboo, making it a great option for those who are health-conscious and want to avoid exposure to harmful chemicals.
【Versatile Usage】The organizer can be used in a variety of settings and for different purposes, from storing snacks and small plants to books and beverages.

【Easy Assembly & After-sales Service】The organizer is easy to assemble and comes with a 3-year warranty, making it a low-risk investment for anyone looking to add some farmhouse charm and practical storage to their home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice table organizer
reviews.reviewText: Looks great and easy to put together. Perfect size to help keep things a little organized on the dining table in my trailer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: This organizer is amazing. My counter is pretty clutter free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a little smaller than I thought it would be. Using in between the commode and wall to set my stuff on. Very easy to put together. Stickers are hard to get off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shelf!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this shelf! Much bigger than I expected and very easy to assemble! Holds a lot and very attractive. I put it in my bathroom and it helped clear up all of the clutter on my bathroom sink! So happy I got this shelf! May buy another for my office!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Facil de ensamblar, tiene buena terminación. El material se ve que es duradero.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Careful with the paint
reviews.reviewText: The first time that it arrived, it was missing the rails; Amazon promptly sent another one complete. It is nice to have extra decorative storage for counters or toilet tops. The downside of this is that the paint chips easily. It would have been better quality if they'd put a top coat on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, my son's bathroom is organized.
reviews.reviewText: The hall bathroom is my son's primary bathroom. He's a teenager, and thus a slob. But it's also the guest bathroom. While we're working to keep him on track with picking up every day, even if it's just for five minutes, he's still getting the hang of it. One of his problems is keeping organized. He does so much better with things in view, whereas I prefer them tucked out of sight to make things look cleaner.But I thought that this shelf looked pretty nice and that it would be useful. I so glad that I picked it up.It came with all the hardware and with a screwdriver, so it can be set up right out of the box. There are no instructions, but it's super easy to figure out. The two short, fat pieces are the end pieces. There are indents to fit the two shelves into on either end piece, and there's no way to get them backward or upside down, as long as you match up the tops/bottoms of the end pieces. The skinny pieces that are rails for the top shelf fit have dowel rods installed, so they push right into those holes. The easiest way to do this thing is to fit the bottom shelf to one end piece and screw it in. The holes are predrilled and lined up perfectly, so it's not super hard to do. Except the screwdriver is very slim, so grab a fatter one if you have big hands, or you'll be cursing that screwdriver after the first screw is fully fitted in.After the first level shelf, screw in the second level shelf. Then the top rail with dowel rods pop right in the holes. Once all that's done, line up the other end piece to the other shelves. It might take a bit of work, and one of my shelves had a slight gap, so the screws didn't go in all the way, as it was already tightly screwed into the other end piece. Not a problem for me, as the screw went in 3/4 of the way or more, and it didn't rattle or wobble and felt very sturdy.Once it's all fitted together, it looks awesome! I guess it's a farmhouse look, but I'm not a decor expert. While it's a pale gray color with a streaky, whitewashed look, it also has a pale beige color to the wood. So, it's very versatile. The colors that shine through are going to depend on your decor, as they're blended very subtly.I fit in a spare toilet paper roll and a packet of cleaning wipes on the bottom shelf, instead of packing it with toilet paper. Up top is his toothpaste, skin cleaning products, brush, a decorative sign, a mirror, and a few other small items. It's gotten everything up off the counter that I needed up, plus is extra storage for toilet paper that isn't in your face for guests who use up the end of the roll on the hanger.It looks really nice. It's useful. I only spent ten minutes putting it together. Price is great and it looks awesome. If it wasn't so darn efficient at storage, I'd pick up another!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars DOES NOT FIT ON THE BACK OF ALL TOILET SEATS
reviews.reviewText: I really love the look of this little shelf that you put on the back of your toilet. It has the old farmhouse rustic look. It was really easy to put together. Then when I tried to go put it on the back of my toilet I was bummed because it didn't fit luckily it fit the back of my upstairs toilet. So just beware that it only fits on top of the back of certain toilet lids. It would also be cute to put on a desk or shelf or uses a decorations so doesn't just have to go on the back of your toilet. I really liked it though so yeah I would definitely recommend as long as you get the measurements and make sure it will fit if you're going to use it for putting on the back of your toilet.
